summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6076 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 156, Gilman's Addition, being the alley between West Halladay Street and West Smith Street from Thorndyke Avenue to 24th Avenue West; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83413, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
